description: floor[ T_(n+1)/T_(n) ] where T_n is n-th tangential or "Zag" number (see A000182).
references: Peters J. and Stein J. - Matematische Tafeln . Revised Russian Edition in 1968, Moscow, Table 9a.
formula: a(n)=[ T(n+1)/T(n) ] where T(n) is n-th coefficient in expansion of tan(x).
author: _Labos Elemer_
